gold.user: A factory manager wants to add a new machine to the system. They provide the machine's specifications, including type, model, and operational capacity.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully create a new machine entry in the database and return a confirmation message along with the machine ID.

gold.user: A maintenance supervisor needs to review all open maintenance tickets to prioritize repairs. They want to fetch the latest tickets for review.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all open maintenance tickets, including ticket IDs, descriptions, and statuses, in a structured format.

gold.user: A data analyst is collecting real-time sensor data from various machines. They send a batch of sensor readings for processing and analysis.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the sensor readings and return a success message with a summary of the data processed.
